vernac_cmds: unfold tan; rewrite sin_PI; rewrite cos_PI; unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_0_l.
rewrite sin_plus; rewrite sin_PI; rewrite cos_PI; rewrite sin_PI2; ring.
pattern PI at 1; rewrite (double_var PI); ring.
unfold tan; rewrite sin_2PI; unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_0_l.
replace (PI / 2 + PI / 4) with (- (PI / 4) + PI) by field.
unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; [ apply PI_RGT_0 | apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; prove_sup0 ].
replace (2 * cos (PI / 6) * sin (PI / 6)) with (2 * sin (PI / 6) * cos (PI / 6)) by ring.
rewrite <- sin_2a; replace (2 * (PI / 6)) with (PI / 3) by field.
cut (0 < cos (PI / 6)); [ intro H1; auto with real | apply cos_gt_0; [ apply (Rlt_trans (- (PI / 2)) 0 (PI / 6) _PI2_RLT_0 PI6_RGT_0) | apply PI6_RLT_PI2 ] ].
assert (Hyp : 0 < 2); [ prove_sup0 | generalize (Rlt_le 0 2 Hyp); intro H1; red; intro H2; generalize (sqrt_eq_0 2 H1 H2); intro H; absurd (2 = 0); [ discrR | assumption ] ].
generalize (Rinv_neq_0_compat (sqrt 2) sqrt2_neq_0); intro H; generalize (prod_neq_R0 1 (/ sqrt 2) R1_neq_R0 H); intro H0; assumption.

apply prod_neq_R0; [ discrR | assert (Hyp : 0 < 3); [ prove_sup0 | generalize (Rlt_le 0 3 Hyp); intro H1; red; intro H2; generalize (sqrt_eq_0 3 H1 H2); intro H; absurd (3 = 0); [ discrR | assumption ] ] ].

assert (Hyp : 0 < 2); [ prove_sup0 | generalize (sqrt_positivity 2 (Rlt_le 0 2 Hyp)); intro H1; elim H1; intro H2; [ assumption | absurd (0 = sqrt 2); [ apply (not_eq_sym (A:=R)); apply sqrt2_neq_0 | assumption ] ] ].

cut (0%nat <> 1%nat); [ intro H0; assert (Hyp : 0 < 2); [ prove_sup0 | generalize (Rlt_le 0 2 Hyp); intro H1; assert (Hyp2 : 0 < 3); [ prove_sup0 | generalize (Rlt_le 0 3 Hyp2); intro H2; generalize (lt_INR_0 1 (neq_O_lt 1 H0)); unfold INR; intro H3; generalize (Rplus_lt_compat_l 2 0 1 H3); rewrite Rplus_comm; rewrite Rplus_0_l; replace (2 + 1) with 3; [ intro H4; generalize (sqrt_lt_1 2 3 H1 H2 H4); clear H3; intro H3; apply (Rlt_trans 0 (sqrt 2) (sqrt 3) Rlt_sqrt2_0 H3) | ring ] ] ] | discriminate ].
unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; [ apply PI_RGT_0 | apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; prove_sup0 ].
unfold Rsqr; pattern (cos (PI / 4)) at 1; rewrite <- sin_cos_PI4; replace (sin (PI / 4) * cos (PI / 4)) with (1 / 2 * (2 * sin (PI / 4) * cos (PI / 4))) by field.
rewrite <- sin_2a; replace (2 * (PI / 4)) with (PI / 2) by field.
rewrite cos_shift; rewrite sin_neg; rewrite sin_PI4.
rewrite cos2; unfold Rsqr; rewrite sin_PI6; rewrite sqrt_def...
unfold tan; rewrite sin_PI6; rewrite cos_PI6; unfold Rdiv; repeat rewrite Rmult_1_l; rewrite Rinv_mult_distr.
red; intro; assert (H1 := Rlt_sqrt3_0); rewrite H in H1; elim (Rlt_irrefl 0 H1).
unfold tan; rewrite sin_PI3; rewrite cos_PI3; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_1_l; rewrite Rinv_involutive.
rewrite double; rewrite sin_plus; rewrite sin_PI3; rewrite cos_PI3; unfold Rdiv; repeat rewrite Rmult_1_l; rewrite (Rmult_comm (/ 2)); repeat rewrite <- Rmult_assoc; rewrite double_var; reflexivity.
rewrite neg_cos; rewrite cos_PI4; unfold Rdiv.
rewrite neg_sin; rewrite sin_PI4; unfold Rdiv.
apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; [ prove_sup0 | unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; [ apply PI_RGT_0 | apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; prove_sup0 ] ].
generalize PI2_RGT_0; intro H1; generalize (Rplus_lt_compat_l PI 0 (PI / 2) H1); replace (PI + PI / 2) with (3 * (PI / 2)).
pattern PI at 2; rewrite double_var; ring.
generalize PI2_RGT_0; intro H1; generalize (Rplus_lt_compat_l (3 * (PI / 2)) 0 (PI / 2) H1); replace (3 * (PI / 2) + PI / 2) with (2 * PI).
rewrite double; pattern PI at 1 2; rewrite double_var; ring.
Definition toRad (x:R) : R := x * PI * / plat.
Definition toDeg (x:R) : R := x * plat * / PI.
Lemma rad_deg : forall x:R, toRad (toDeg x) = x.
intro; unfold toRad, toDeg; replace (x * plat * / PI * PI * / plat) with (x * (plat * / plat) * (PI * / PI)); [ idtac | ring ].
Lemma toRad_inj : forall x y:R, toRad x = toRad y -> x = y.
intros; unfold toRad in H; apply Rmult_eq_reg_l with PI.
Lemma deg_rad : forall x:R, toDeg (toRad x) = x.
intro x; apply toRad_inj; rewrite (rad_deg (toRad x)); reflexivity.
Lemma Rsqr_sin_cos_d_one : forall x:R, Rsqr (sind x) + Rsqr (cosd x) = 1.
intro x; unfold sind; unfold cosd; apply sin2_cos2.
Lemma sin_lb_ge_0 : forall a:R, 0 <= a -> a <= PI / 2 -> 0 <= sin_lb a.
rewrite <- H2; unfold sin_lb; unfold sin_approx; unfold sum_f_R0; unfold sin_term; repeat rewrite pow_ne_zero.
unfold Rdiv; repeat rewrite Rmult_0_l; repeat rewrite Rmult_0_r; repeat rewrite Rplus_0_r; right; reflexivity.

rewrite double; pattern PI at 1 2; rewrite double_var; ring.
intro; unfold toRad, toDeg; replace (x * plat * / PI * PI * / plat) with (x * (plat * / plat) * (PI * / PI)); [ idtac | ring ].

intro x; apply toRad_inj; rewrite (rad_deg (toRad x)); reflexivity.
